greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of squares of primes dividing n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} prime(k)^2*x^prime(k)/(1 - x^prime(k)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Dec 24 2016
Dirichlet g.f.: primezeta(s-2)*zeta(s). - _Benedict W. J. Irwin_, Jul 11 2018
mathematica: a[n_] := Total[FactorInteger[n][[All, 1]]^2]; a[1]=0; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 60}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 20 2017 *)
program: def a(n): return sum(p**2 for p in primefactors(n))
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 101)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jul 11 2017
xref: Cf. A067666, A081403, A048261. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, May 03 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
ext: More terms from _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, May 03 2009
